page.title: 12HOUSING IN BURNHAM MARKET 1
page.content:
Burnham Market has 145 council houses and all of them are in this survey block. Most are on the Sutton Estate: this includes Croft's Close (attractive new terraced houses) and Sutton Lea (17 warden controlled bungalows for the elderly).
There are demands from some people in the village for more council housing to be built as young people from local families cannot afford to compete with purchasers of "holiday cottages". However, the borough council has only two families on the waiting list for council houses in the village, regards the village as well-provided with council houses and cannot afford to build any more. Some families have bought their houses from the council.
